attributes.action: Britain is full so stop letting everyone in or our problems will triple!
attributes.additional_details: Because the British people come first!!! They need to stop the foreign aid bill altogether and sort out our homeless and the food bank situation and help its own people! Letting 20,000 + more immigrants in would make those situations 100 times worse and the British people should come first! It's ok for them lot they get paid thousands for doing everything wrong! We need to get rid of every member and get people in who would do the job properly for its own people!
attributes.background: We want them to stop pussy footing around and letting all and sundry into our country when we have too many of our own problems to deal with! Our vets are on the streets, ppl struggle with just every day life thru lack of money and the government needs to put us first and stop giving our money away!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about immigration, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Leave the 1951 Refugee Convention and 1967 Protocol & revoke the Immigration Act: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577927

Cancel the Afghan citizens’ resettlement scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595224

If you want the Government to take an action different to the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
